topic.title: Show avatars on grid view
topic.p: You can see “who’s working on what” in the grid view. If you have team member properties setup, Mingle will show the avatars of the first three user properties for your cards. To change who's working on what, just drag and drop the avatars on and off the cards of interest.
For example, if you love pair programming like us, you can follow these steps to setup your card wall with avatars:

item.p: Create a card property for “owner” and another for “pair”.
Drag the two properties to the top of property list of your card type.

Go to your grid view, cards with “owner” and “pair” value set will have avatars on them. To set the owner and pair, just drag the avatar in the bottom tray to the appropriate card. You can search for team members to drag by clicking the three dots on the footer and entering their user name or email in the search text box. To unset the owner and pair, just drag the avatars off.

bullets.item: For our Mingle in the cloud customers, we will use your Gravatar image by default, but you have all the freedom to change it to a cooler one via your Mingle profile page. If you do not have a Gravatar image and have not set your avatar, it will default to the first letter of your first name. N.B. Gravatar integration will not be supported for Mingle onsite customers.
You can drag-and-drop card properties to sort them on card type edit page
You can hide properties on property management page to help minimize noise
